blogPost.excerpt: Free mobile app that helps the 50 million microbusinesses in Latin America become more efficient. The app allows owners to record transactions, track credits and debits, see business statistics, gain control over their inventory, among many other things.
blogPost.body: Free mobile app that helps the 50 million microbusinesses in Latin America become more efficient. The app allows owners to record transactions, track credits and debits, see business statistics, gain control over their inventory, among many other things.
blogPost.title: Treinta - Digital ledger app for Latin American microbusinesses
blogPost.author: Man Hei Lou

localize.description: 免费的移动应用，帮助拉美5000万微商提高工作效率。该应用允许企业主记录交易、跟踪贷记和借记、查看业务统计、控制库存等。
localize.tagline: 拉美微型企业的数字账本应用

localize.description: 免費的移動應用，幫助拉美5000萬微商提高工作效率。該應用允許企業主記錄交易、跟蹤貸記和借記、查看業務統計、控制庫存等。
localize.tagline: 拉美微型企業的數字賬本應用

previous.excerpt: Websu.io helps you optimize your web applications for speed by generating detailed speed reports. The speed reports are run using Chrome and show you how you can optimize your web application to improve the performance.
previous.title: Websu - Open source website speed, optimization & monitoring service

localize.description: Websu.io通过生成详细的速度报告，帮助您优化网络应用的速度。这些速度报告使用Chrome浏览器运行，并向您展示如何优化您的Web应用程序以提高性能。
localize.tagline: 开源网站速度、优化和监控服务

localize.description: Websu.io通過生成詳細的速度報告，幫助您優化網絡應用的速度。這些速度報告使用Chrome瀏覽器運行，並向您展示如何優化您的Web應用程序以提高性能。
localize.tagline: 開源網站速度、優化和監控服務
